title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.4 - Hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง 2.4 - Hearing

State Regulations
(a) The respondent
and the superintendent shall appear for hearing before the Banking Board at the
place and time fixed in the notice of hearing. (b) If it shall appear at the hearing that
there are material disputed issues of fact, or if the superintendent or
respondent requests oral testimony, or if the Banking Board for any reason
desires oral testimony, the Banking Board shall direct that sworn evidence be
taken, either before itself or before a hearing officer designated by the

Banking Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3ยง
2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
